Bases: object

Class Network1

Parameters

  • depth – Depth of the network

  • in_channel – Number of channel of the input layer

  • out_channel – Number of channels of the output layer

  • dropout – Type of dropout applied

  • callbacks – Callbacks applied to the network

Function that transforms your constructor items into a list of Parameter objects

Parameters

  • optionable_class_object – Object that is optionable (every constructor argument has default value)

  • object_key – Name of the main object

Returns

None

Function that returns experiment objects initialized by option parser input

required objects :param option_values: Dictionnary containing the values inputted as options :return: None

This function manage the options of your experiments

Parameters

experiment_objects – A dictionnary of list of optionable

objects used in your experiment :return: A decorator that can be applied on every fonction
